description.value:
Transfer Cost 1

You can use your vitality network as an extradimensional storage space, sliding items into and out of thin air as if it were a null space chamber. You can Interact with an item that weighs 1 Bulk or less to stow it into your Cloud Storage. A creature in your bond and on the same plane can pay the transfer cost to remove an item from your Cloud Storage as an Interact action. Your Cloud Storage has a capacity of 12 Bulk. When you become expert or higher in your connection skill, it becomes 25 Bulk; 50 Bulk at master, and 75 Bulk at legendary.

@UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.Item.3bbBxY9CtdW0aBpE]{Effect: Cloud Storage}
